quality_assessment: Subsection provides basic field listing but lacks field type details, relationships, and important context about field interactions. Documentation is accurate but incomplete.

issues.description: Table lacks detail about field types and constraints - no mention that commands is Vec<WorkflowCommand>, env is HashMap<String, String>, etc.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add type information column or expand descriptions to clarify exact types (e.g., 'commands: Array<WorkflowCommand>', 'env: Map<String, String>')

issues.description: Missing explanation of how fields interact - no mention that profiles override env, or that secrets are a special type of environment variable
issues.fix_suggestion: Add section explaining field precedence and relationships, especially for environment variable resolution

issues.description: Note about simple array format is accurate but could be clearer about when to use each format
issues.fix_suggestion: Add guidance on choosing between formats: 'Use simple array for quick scripts with no env vars; use full format when you need environment configuration'

issues.description: Missing cross-references to detailed documentation for complex fields like merge workflow and profiles
issues.fix_suggestion: Add links to Environment Variables and Custom Merge Workflows sections for readers who need detailed information

issues.description: Missing the optional 'name' field from the table - this field exists in WorkflowConfig but is not documented
issues.fix_suggestion: Add row: '| name | String | No | Workflow name for identification (defaults to "default") |'

positive_aspects: Clear table format for field reference
Good note about simple vs full format distinction
improvement_suggestions: Add examples showing both simple and full formats side-by-side
Include type information for each field to help users understand structure
Add cross-references to related sections (Environment Variables, Merge Workflows)
Explain precedence rules for environment variable fields
